video.title: Cosmos: A Spacetime Odyssey
video.synopsis: Astrophysicist Neil deGrasse Tyson presents new revelations about time and space in this reboot of the original "Cosmos" documentary series.

episodes.synopsis: Discover Earth's "cosmic address" and meet Renaissance Italy's Giordano Bruno, who had an epiphany about the infinite expanse of the universe.
episodes.title: Standing Up in the Milky Way

episodes.synopsis: Explore the relatedness of all livings things, including how artificial selection developed canines and how natural selection sculpted the human eye.
episodes.title: Some of the Things That Molecules Do

episodes.synopsis: Chase a comet through its million-year plunge toward the sun. Later, retrace the unlikely friendship between Sir Isaac Newton and Edmond Halley.
episodes.title: When Knowledge Conquered Fear

episodes.synopsis: Explores how light, time and gravity affect our perception of the universe. Also, travel to the event horizon of a black hole.
episodes.title: A Sky Full of Ghosts

episodes.synopsis: Explore 11th-century Europe and North Africa during the golden age of Islam, when physicist Ibn al-Haytham discovered the scientific method.
episodes.title: Hiding in the Light

episodes.synopsis: Embark on a voyage to the bottom of a dewdrop to explore the universe on the smallest scale and observe exotic life forms invisible to the naked eye.
episodes.title: Deeper Deeper Deeper Still

episodes.synopsis: Geochemist Clair Patterson developed the uranium-lead dating method to make an unprecedented discovery: calculating Earth's age at 4.5 billion years.
episodes.title: The Clean Room

episodes.synopsis: Discover the remarkable story of Annie Jump Cannon and Cecilia Payne, two incredible women who uncovered the real-life story of the stars.
episodes.title: Sisters of the Sun

episodes.synopsis: Journey through space and time to grasp how the autobiography of the Earth is written in its atoms, its oceans, its continents and all living things.
episodes.title: The Lost Worlds of Planet Earth

episodes.synopsis: Meet Michael Faraday, inventor of the motor and the generator. His 19th-century ideas paved the way for future scientists to make giant strides.
episodes.title: The Electric Boy

episodes.synopsis: Discover the possibility of beings that live forever. Then, visit the Cosmic Calendar of the Future and contemplate what lies ahead.
episodes.title: The Immortals

episodes.synopsis: Travel to Venus to discover the long history of global warming and the greenhouse effect. Later, explore the detrimental effects of climate change.
episodes.title: The World Set Free

episodes.synopsis: Meet one of science's greatest unsung heroes, Fritz Zwicky, whose prediction of supernovas paved the way for our larger understanding of dark energy.
episodes.title: Unafraid of the Dark
